meta.job_title: Master Crafts Lead Person / Field Supervisor

duties_responsibilities.duty: Self-perform and lead a crew in a variety of operational projects and technical service or repairs in skilled areas including mechanical, machining, electrical/electronic, plumbing, carpentry, millwright, welding, hydraulics/pneumatics.
Provide work direction, orientation, training, and work review/inspection to assigned personnel.
Plan, select, and prepare layouts required of materials for installation, service, and/or repair work.
Provide audit reports of performance levels to management.
Ensure compliance to all license and certification requirements.
Maintain and submit all records and documents to proper authorities.

education_certification.credential: Valid refrigeration Technician, Plumbers or Electricians License for the State of Massachusetts
